The incident in question occurred in 200: year-old congressional aide to Joe Scarborough was found dead in one of Scarborough's district offices.
The Fort Walton Beach Police Department: Lori Klausutis, had mentioned not feeling well to a co-worker the day before her death.
Medical Examiner Dr: Michael Berkland concluded that Klausutis lost consciousness due to an abnormal heart rhythm and fell, hitting her head on a desk, which caused her death.
PolitiFact founder Bill Adair: who covered the incident, published a report with details of the case, including the cause of death and the circumstances leading up to it.
